doc.field: News release: Extemporaneous remarks by H.E. Ambassador Clovis Maksoud, permanent observer of the League of Arab States to the United Nations, and H.E. Ambassador Salim Salim, President of the General Assembly of the United Nations, at a luncheon given by the League of Arab States on the occasion of the 11th Special Session, at the United Nations
